items.title: iPhone 17 Pro 与 iPhone 17 Pro Max：苹果最大旗舰 iPhone 的独占特性 (原标题: iPhone 17 Pro vs. iPhone 17 Pro Max: What's Exclusive to Apple's Largest Flagship iPhone)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iPhone 17 Pro 与 iPhone 17 Pro Max 的差异

最初有传言称，iPhone 17 Pro Max 可能会独占一些功能，例如升级的远摄摄像头。然而，今年的两款设备在通用功能集上保持一致，主要差异体现在尺寸相关的方面。

![iPhone 17 Pro 橙色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/4florp9_MmJ-5TCgKG9_X6HtoLk=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-pro-orange.jpg?lossy)

## 主要差异点

*   **显示屏**
    *   **iPhone 17 Pro Max**：配备更大的 6.9 英寸显示屏。
    *   **iPhone 17 Pro**：配备较小的 6.3 英寸显示屏，因此设备更小、更轻，更易于单手操作。

*   **电池续航**
    *   **iPhone 17 Pro Max**：由于内部空间更大，电池续航时间更长，视频播放最长可达 39 小时，是迄今为止 iPhone 中最长的电池续航。
    *   **iPhone 17 Pro**：视频播放最长可达 33 小时。

*   **存储容量**
    *   **iPhone 17 Pro Max**：最高可选 2TB 存储空间，这是 iPhone 的新上限。2TB 版本的 iPhone 17 Pro Max 售价为 2,000 美元。
    *   **iPhone 17 Pro**：最高可选 1TB 存储空间。存储容量的差异可能也与设备尺寸和内部组件空间有关。

## 总结

选择较小的 iPhone 17 Pro 型号，您将仅错过更大的显示屏、更长的电池续航以及升级到 2TB 存储的选项。两款 iPhone 17 Pro 型号将于本周五开始预订。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro Max 与 iPhone 17 Pro 在通用功能上保持一致，主要差异体现在尺寸。Pro Max 拥有更大的 6.9 英寸显示屏、更长的电池续航（视频播放达 39 小时）以及最高 2TB 的存储选项。而 Pro 型号则为 6.3 英寸显示屏，电池续航为 33 小时，最高存储为 1TB。选择 Pro 型号意味着放弃更大的屏幕、更长的续航和更大的存储容量。
items.translated_title: iPhone 17 Pro 与 iPhone 17 Pro Max：苹果最大旗舰 iPhone 的独占特性
items.content:
Before Apple unveiled the iPhone 17 Pro and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max, there were rumors suggesting that some features like the upgraded Telephoto camera could be exclusive to the Pro Max. In the past, Apple has limited some capabilities to the Pro Max, so it was a possibility, but the two devices have the same general feature set this year.


There are a few things that are different, of course, but that comes down to size.

Display


The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max has a 6.9-inch display, while the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ has a smaller 6.3-inch display. The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ is smaller and lighter weight than the Pro Max, and easier to use one-handed.

Battery


Since there's more room in the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max for the battery, it lasts longer. The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ offers up to 33 hours of video playback, while the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max offers up to 39 hours of video playback. It's the longest battery life in an iPhone to date.

Storage


With the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max, you can get up to 2TB of storage, which is a new upper limit for the ‌iPhone‌. The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ is limited to 1TB. The difference may be due to size and the space inside for storage components.

The 2TB ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max costs $2,000.

There are no other differences between the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max, so if you opt for the smaller Pro model, you're only missing out on a larger display size, a longer battery, and the option to upgrade to 2TB of storage.

The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models will be available for pre-order this Friday.

items.title: 相机平台：iPhone 17 Pro 摄像头有哪些新功能 (原标题: The Camera Plateau: What's New With the iPhone 17 Pro Cameras)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iPhone 17 Pro 摄像头新功能概览

## 全新设计：相机平台
iPhone 17 Pro 和 17 Pro Max 引入了全新的背部设计，将传统的摄像头凸起替换为覆盖几乎整个背部的“相机平台”。这个平台内含升级后的摄像头系统，特别是经过改进的长焦镜头。

![iPhone 17 Pro 深蓝色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/NJpW3_HIDyR5ZW8f5SoPutsy3Y0=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-pro-dark-blue.jpg?lossy)

## 摄像头系统亮点
所有三颗摄像头均升级至 48 兆像素，提供五种变焦选项。

### 1. 长焦镜头 (Fusion Telephoto)
*   **全新升级：** 48 兆像素，相较 iPhone 16 Pro 的 12 兆像素有显著提升。
*   **变焦能力：**
    *   支持 4 倍光学变焦（等效 100 毫米焦距），可拍摄 48 兆像素图像。
    *   支持 8 倍光学变焦（等效 200 毫米焦距），图像限制为 12 兆像素。
    *   8 倍光学变焦可扩展至 40 倍数字变焦。
*   **低光表现：** 传感器尺寸增大 56%，显著提升弱光环境下的性能。
*   **技术特性：** 混合对焦像素、3D 传感器位移光学图像防抖和自动对焦，以及去年引入的四棱镜设计。

![iPhone 17 摄像头变焦](https://images.macrumors.com/t/xhgYZV1bTC2X9fh014g8_gqfWxE=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-cameras-zoom.jpg?lossy)

### 2. 广角镜头 (Fusion Main)
*   **核心功能：** 48 兆像素，与 iPhone 16 Pro 相比变化不大。
*   **拍摄模式：**
    *   标准 24 毫米焦距下可拍摄 24 兆像素或 48 兆像素图像。
    *   48 毫米焦距下可拍摄 12 兆像素 2 倍长焦图像。
*   **技术特性：** 第二代传感器位移光学图像防抖、100% 对焦像素、f/1.78 光圈。

### 3. 超广角镜头 (Fusion Ultra Wide)
*   **规格：** 48 兆像素，13 毫米焦距，f/2.2 光圈，120 度视场角。
*   **特殊功能：** 支持拍摄 48 兆像素微距照片，并支持混合对焦像素。

## 其他硬件组件
*   **LiDAR 扫描仪与闪光灯：** 相机平台右侧集成自适应原彩闪光灯和 LiDAR 扫描仪。

## 软件与计算摄影功能
*   **光像引擎 (Photonic Engine)：** 结合高分辨率图像和优化光线捕捉的图像，生成细节丰富的 24 兆像素图像，尤其适用于弱光环境。
*   **深度融合 (Deep Fusion)：** 在中低光照条件下工作，增强图像的纹理和细节。
*   **智能 HDR 5：** 识别场景中的人物，优化对比度、光照和肤色。
*   **带对焦和景深控制的人像模式：** 无需预先选择人像模式，系统可自动识别人物或宠物并启用背景虚化。支持夜间模式。
*   **人像光效：** 提供多种人像模式光效。
*   **夜间模式：** 通过多帧合成，在极低光照下拍摄清晰照片。
*   **全景模式：** 可拍摄高达 63 兆像素的全景照片。
*   **摄影风格：** 拍摄前可实时预览并应用滤镜，新增“明亮”选项。
*   **空间照片和视频：** 拍摄可在 Vision Pro 上以 3D 形式观看的照片和视频。
*   **ProRAW：** 专业视频录制选项。
*   **镜头校正：** 消除超广角镜头的畸变。
*   **自动图像防抖：** 修正相机抖动。
*   **连拍模式：** 适用于捕捉高速运动场景。

## 视频拍摄能力
*   **高分辨率录制：** 支持 4K 杜比视界视频录制，最高可达 120 帧/秒。
*   **专业视频：**
    *   连接外部存储设备时，支持 4K 120fps ProRes 视频录制。
    *   新增 ProRes RAW 录制功能。
    *   支持 Apple Log 2 和 Genlock 视频同步，面向专业电影制作人。
*   **双重拍摄 (Dual Capture)：** 可同时使用前后摄像头进行录制，最高支持 4K 杜比视界 30 帧/秒。
*   **其他视频功能：**
    *   电影效果模式：最高 4K 杜比视界 30 帧/秒，保持主体对焦。
    *   运动模式：最高 2.8K 杜比视界 60 帧/秒，增强防抖。
    *   空间视频录制：1080p 30 帧/秒，支持空间音频。
    *   Academy Color Encoding System (ACES) 支持。
    *   微距视频录制，包括慢动作和延时摄影。
    *   1080p 慢动作最高 240 帧/秒，或 4K 杜比视界 120 帧/秒。
    *   快速视频、最高 15 倍数字变焦、电影级视频防抖、连续自动对焦视频、音频混合和风噪降低。

## 前置摄像头
*   **全新升级：** 全新的 18 兆像素“人物居中”前置摄像头。
*   **规格：** f/1.8 光圈。
*   **人物居中 (Center Stage)：** 视频通话时，自动调整画面以保持用户在画面中央。
*   **传感器改进：** 传感器更大，呈方形，可在画面中容纳更多内容。
*   **拍摄灵活性：** 无需旋转手机即可在横向或纵向模式下拍摄前置照片。
*   **视频防抖：** 视频拍摄防抖功能得到改进。
*   **双重拍摄：** 可与后置摄像头配合使用。

![iPhone 17 前置摄像头](https://images.macrumors.com/t/nB7oPNNrcI6-qNI5tq9qke_XzEw=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-front-facing-camera.jpg?lossy)

## 其他 iPhone 型号的摄像头配置
*   **iPhone 17 Pro 型号：** 独有的三摄像头系统。
*   **标准 iPhone 17：** 双镜头系统（广角和超广角）。
*   **iPhone Air：** 单镜头摄像头（相当于 17 Pro 的主摄像头）。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max引入了全新的“相机平台”设计，其三颗摄像头均升级至48兆像素。核心亮点包括全新的48兆像素长焦镜头，支持4倍和8倍光学变焦（最高40倍数字变焦），并配备更大的传感器以提升弱光性能。广角和超广角镜头也为48兆像素。前置摄像头升级为18兆像素，支持人物居中功能。视频方面，新增4K 120fps ProRes RAW录制和双重拍摄等专业特性，并集成光像引擎、智能HDR 5等计算摄影功能。
items.translated_title: 相机平台：iPhone 17 Pro 摄像头有哪些新功能
items.content:
With the iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max, Apple introduced a new design for the rear of the device. Instead of a camera bump, we now have a camera plateau that spans almost the entire back of the iPhone. The camera plateau houses an upgraded camera system that includes a revamped Telephoto lens.


All three of the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and Pro Max cameras are 48 megapixels, and there are five zoom options across the lenses.

Telephoto Lens


The 48-megapixel Fusion Telephoto lens is new, and an upgrade over the 12-megapixel Telephoto lens in the iPhone 16 Pro models. It supports 4x zoom, or a 100mm focal length equivalent. At 4x zoom, you can capture 48-megapixel images.


It also supports 8x zoom, or a 200mm focal length equivalent. 8x zoom images are limited to 12 megapixels. Apple says that the Telephoto sensor is 56 percent larger, allowing for improved performance in poor lighting conditions.

The Telephoto lens supports Hybrid Focus Pixels, 3D sensor-shift optical image stabilization and autofocus, and it has the tetraprism design that Apple introduced last year.

The 8x optical zoom can be expanded to 40x digital zoom. It doesn't quite match the 100x zoom that Samsung's smartphones are known for, but it does expand the zoom range compared to prior iPhones.

Wide Lens


The 48-megapixel wide-angle lens, or Fusion Main lens as Apple refers to it, hasn't changed much compared to the ‌iPhone 16 Pro‌.

You can take 24-megapixel or 48-megapixel images at the standard 24mm focal length, or 12-megapixel 2x Telephoto images at a 48mm focal length.

Features include second-generation sensor-shift optical image stabilization, 100 percent Focus Pixels, and an f/1.78 aperture.

Ultra Wide-Angle Lens


Apple calls the 48-megapixel ultra wide lens the Fusion Ultra Wide. It has a 13mm focal length, an f/2.2 aperture, and a 120 degree field of view. It supports taking close-up 48-megapixel macro shots, and has support for what Apple calls Hybrid Focus Pixels.

LiDAR and Flash


At the right side of the camera plateau, there's an Adaptive True Tone Flash and LiDAR Scanner.

Other Camera Features


Other camera technology that Apple has introduced over the years is included.

  • Photonic Engine - Combines the best pixels from a high-resolution image and an image optimized for light capture, producing a 24-megapixel image with detail sourced from an image twice the resolution. The Photonic Engine kicks in for low light images.

  • Deep Fusion - Works in mid to low lighting conditions and brings out the texture and detail in the image. It improves images with medium lighting.

  • Smart HDR 5 - Recognizes one or more people in a scene and optimizes contrast, lighting, and skin tones so everyone looks their best.

  • Portrait images with Focus and Depth Control - You don't need to choose Portrait mode before capturing an image to get a portrait shot. You can just snap a photo, and if there's a person or a pet, depth information is collected and Portrait mode is enabled automatically with a blurred background. It works for Night mode, too.

  • Portrait Lighting - Changes the lighting of Portrait mode photos with effects that include Natural, Studio, Contour, Stage, Stage Mono, and High-Key Mono.

  • Night mode - Takes a series of images over a few seconds and aggregates them to allow for photography in extreme low lighting situations.

  • Panorama - Captures panoramic shots that are up to 63 megapixels in size.

  • Photographic Styles (including a new Bright option this year) - Photographic Styles are filters that you can apply before an image is captured, previewing them as you take a shot.

  • Spatial photos and videos - Videos and photos captured in spatial mode can be viewed in 3D on the Vision Pro.

  • ProRAW - A pro video recording option.

  • Lens correction (for the Ultra Wide) - Eliminates distortion.

  • Auto image stabilization - Corrects for camera shake.

  • Burst mode - Allows a series of images to be captured all at once, which is good for high-action shots.



Video Capabilities


The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models support recording 4K Dolby Vision video at up to 120 frames per second.

4K 120fps ProRes video recording is available with an external storage device attached, and the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models support ProRes RAW recording, a new feature this year. There's also support for Apple Log 2 and Genlock video synchronization, pro features aimed at filmmakers.

Apple added a Dual Capture feature that records from the front and back cameras at the same time. Dual Capture supports up to 4K Dolby Vision recording at 30 frames per second.

Other video features that Apple has added over the years are also available.

  • Cinematic mode up to 4K Dolby Vision at 30 fps for keeping the focus on the main subject while you move

  • Action mode up to 2.8K Dolby Vision at 60 fps for enhancing stabilization to reduce shake

  • Spatial video recording at 1080p at 30 fps, with spatial audio

  • Academy Color Encoding System

  • Macro video recording, including slo-mo and time-lapse

  • 1080p Slo-mo support at up to 240 fps, or 4K Dolby Vision at 120 fps

  • Time-lapse

  • QuickTake

  • Digital zoom up to 15x

  • Cinematic video stabilization

  • Continuous autofocus video

  • Audio Mix and wind noise reduction



Front Camera


Apple added a new 18-megapixel Center Stage front-facing camera for selfies and video calls. It has an f/1.8 aperture, and as the name suggests, it supports Center Stage. Center Stage is the feature that keeps you in frame during video calls as you move around.


The updated front camera sensor is larger and it is square-shaped, which means more can fit in the frame than before. You can even take front-facing cameras in landscape or portrait mode without rotating your phone. Apple also improved stabilization when capturing video.

Dual Capture video works with both the front and rear cameras, so you can record a scene and your reaction at the same time.

Other iPhones


The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models are the only devices that have the three-camera setup. The standard iPhone 17 has a dual-lens camera setup with wide and ultra-wide lenses, while the iPhone Air has a single-lens camera that's equivalent to the Main camera on the 17 Pro.

items.title: iPhone 17 Pro 和 17 Pro Max 上手体验 (原标题: iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max Hands-On)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### iPhone 17 Pro 和 17 Pro Max 上手体验概览

苹果于2025年9月9日发布了iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max，并向媒体提供了上手体验机会。MacRumors的摄像师Dan Barbera分享了对新设计和功能的初步印象。新机型将于9月19日正式上市。

#### 设计与材质革新
*   **机身框架：** iPhone 17 Pro系列采用了全新的**一体式铝合金框架**，取代了之前使用的钛金属和玻璃材质。
*   **摄像头模组：** 摄像头区域周围也采用了铝合金材质，且摄像头模组尺寸明显增大。
*   **背板设计：** 背部除用于MagSafe充电的陶瓷晶体护盾（Ceramic Shield）嵌件外，其余部分均为铝合金。
*   **双色调外观：** 铝合金与陶瓷晶体护盾的结合，赋予了新机独特的**双色调外观**。
*   **手感与做工：** 新iPhone手感坚固，做工精良。

#### 耐用性显著提升
*   苹果承诺新机的**耐用性和抗刮擦性**均有所改善。
*   **防眩光涂层：** 新增了防眩光涂层，虽然变化不显著，但能有效减少眩光。
*   **正面保护：** 正面屏幕采用**Ceramic Shield 2**，其抗刮擦性比前代提升了3倍。
*   **背面保护：** 背面陶瓷晶体护盾的抗裂性比前代玻璃背板提升了4倍。

#### 颜色选项
*   今年iPhone 17 Pro系列提供了**深蓝色、橙色和银色**三种颜色。
*   值得注意的是，今年没有提供深空黑或深空灰等经典颜色选项。

#### 摄像头升级
*   **长焦镜头：** 新增了一颗长焦镜头，支持高达**8倍光学变焦**。
*   **前置摄像头：** 升级了前置摄像头，用户无需旋转手机即可在**人像或横向模式下自拍**。

#### 其他相关发布信息
文章中还提及了苹果在同一发布会上或近期宣布的其他产品和策略：
*   **iPhone Air：** 苹果发布了全新的iPhone Air，其特点是超薄设计，厚度仅5.6毫米，是迄今为止最薄的iPhone。它采用钛金属框架，正反面均配备Ceramic Shield 2。
*   **eSIM-Only：** iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max在特定国家和地区（包括巴林、加拿大、关岛、日本、科威特、墨西哥、阿曼、卡塔尔、沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋等）将仅支持eSIM，逐步淘汰实体SIM卡托盘。
*   **AirPods Pro 3：** 苹果计划在2025年和2026年推出两个版本的AirPods Pro 3。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max采用一体式铝合金框架和双色调设计，取代了钛金属和玻璃。新机耐用性显著提升，正面为Ceramic Shield 2，背面陶瓷晶体护盾抗裂性更强。摄像头方面，新增8倍变焦长焦镜头，前置摄像头支持无需旋转即可人像/横向自拍。颜色包括深蓝、橙、银。新机将于9月19日上市。此外，苹果还发布了超薄的iPhone Air，并在部分国家推行eSIM-only策略。
items.translated_title: iPhone 17 Pro 和 17 Pro Max 上手体验
items.content:
Apple introduced the iPhone 17 Pro and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max yesterday and gave members of the media some hands-on time with them. MacRumors videographer Dan Barbera was able to take a look to check out the new design and share his first impressions.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

Rather than using titanium and glass, the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models have a unibody aluminum frame. There's aluminum around the camera plateau and at the back except for where there's a Ceramic Shield insert for MagSafe charging. The camera plateau is much bigger, and there's a two-tone look thanks to the aluminum and Ceramic Shield design.

The updated iPhones feel solid and well built, and Apple promises that durability and scratch resistance have improved. Apple added a new anti-reflective coating, and while it's not a dramatic change, it does cut down on glare.

The new dark blue and orange color options are attention grabbing, but Apple didn't provide a space black or space gray kind of option. It's silver, orange, or dark blue only this year.

There's a new Telephoto lens that supports up to 8x zoom, and an upgraded front-facing camera that lets you take selfies in portrait or landscape mode without rotating your phone.

Apple is launching the new iPhones on September 19, and we'll have a more comprehensive review then. We also took a look at the iPhone Air if you want to check out that video.

items.title: Apple Store 在加州最大购物中心临时搬迁 (原标题: Apple Store Temporarily Relocates at California's Largest Shopping Mall)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## Apple Store 南海岸广场店临时搬迁

Apple 于2025年9月10日宣布，其位于加利福尼亚州科斯塔梅萨南海岸广场购物中心的零售店已进行临时搬迁。

### 搬迁详情
*   **新店位置**：Apple 已在购物中心内开设了一家临时商店，距离原店仅几步之遥。
*   **搬迁原因**：原店预计将进行翻新工程。
*   **重开时间**：Apple 尚未公布原店何时重新开放，但此类翻新通常需要数月时间。

### 门店背景
*   **开业时间**：Apple 南海岸广场店于2001年开业，是 Apple 最早的零售店之一，位于奥兰治县的中心地带。
*   **购物中心地位**：南海岸广场是加利福尼亚州最大的购物中心。

### 顾客通知
*   Apple 已于上周通过电子邮件通知了部分顾客此次搬迁事宜。
*   今天，Apple 也在其官网的商店页面上发布了搬迁通知。

![Apple South Coast Plaza](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-cTwnsSg6Y8LfS9Go22eRninRWA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/Apple-South-Coast-Plaza.jpeg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Apple 宣布其位于加州最大购物中心南海岸广场的零售店已临时搬迁。新店设在原店附近，原店将进行翻新，预计耗时数月。这家于2001年开业的门店是Apple最早的零售店之一。Apple已通过电子邮件和官网通知顾客此次搬迁。
items.translated_title: Apple Store 在加州最大购物中心临时搬迁
items.content:
Apple today announced that its retail store at the South Coast Plaza shopping mall, in Costa Mesa, California, has temporarily relocated.


Apple has opened a temporary store in the mall, just down the hall from its original location, which will presumably be renovated. The company has not indicated when the original store will reopen, but its renovations often take months.

Opened in 2001, Apple South Coast Plaza was one of the company's first retail locations, in the heart of Orange County. The mall is the largest in California.

Apple already alerted some customers about the store relocation via email last week, and today it posted a notice on the store's page on its website.

items.title: 新款Apple Watch 5G功能在多个国家/地区发布时缺失 (原标题: New Apple Watch 5G Feature Missing in Multiple Countries at Launch)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 新款Apple Watch 5G功能发布时在多国缺失

Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch Ultra 3和Apple Watch SE 3均配备了升级的5G调制解调器和天线架构，但在发布时，部分国家/地区将无法使用5G连接。

## 5G功能可用性概览

*   **不支持5G的地区**：加拿大、澳大利亚、新西兰、巴西、墨西哥、沙特阿拉伯，以及欧洲、南美洲、非洲和亚洲的多个其他国家/地区。
*   **支持5G的地区**：美国、英国、德国、法国、瑞士、西班牙、阿联酋、泰国、日本、中国、新加坡、印度等。

## 可能的原因

目前尚不清楚为何部分国家/地区无法使用5G连接，但可能的原因包括：
*   缺乏监管批准。
*   当地运营商尚未添加对Apple Watch 5G功能的支持。

## 支持5G的运营商（发布时）

在Apple的发布会上，展示了以下支持Apple Watch 5G的运营商：
*   **美国**：Verizon、AT&T、T-Mobile、Boost Mobile、US Cellular、Metro by T-Mobile
*   **欧洲/全球**：Orange
*   **英国/国际**：EE、Three/3
*   **瑞士**：Sunrise
*   **泰国**：AIS
*   **日本**：SoftBank、NTT Docomo、au
*   **香港**：SmarTone、CSL
*   **澳门**：CTM
*   **新加坡**：Singtel、M1
*   **中东/非洲**：Zain
*   **阿联酋**：du
*   **中国**：中国联通、中国移动、中国电信
*   **印度**：Jio

值得注意的是，加拿大（如Telus、Bell、Rogers）和澳大利亚（如Telstra、Vodafone、Optus）的主要运营商均未出现在支持列表中。

## 替代方案与未来展望

*   在5G未被列为支持功能的地区，新款Apple Watch型号将依赖LTE连接。
*   Apple并未为不同国家/地区提供单独的Apple Watch型号（中国除外），这意味着在目前无法使用5G的国家/地区销售的Apple Watch很可能与美国及其他支持5G的地区销售的Apple Watch拥有相同的5G调制解调器。
*   如果情况属实，一旦当地运营商开始提供支持，这些地区的5G连接功能有望在未来被启用。

![Apple Watch Series 11 5G](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iE_KM6EywiXv2mk65KRl2MOZZNo=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/apple-watch-s11-5g-phone.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 新款Apple Watch Series 11、Ultra 3和SE 3虽配备5G功能，但在发布时，加拿大、澳大利亚、巴西等多个国家/地区无法使用，而美国、英国、日本、中国等地则支持。这可能源于监管或运营商支持不足。在无5G地区，设备将回退至LTE。鉴于硬件可能已内置5G模块，未来随着运营商支持的完善，这些地区的5G功能有望被激活。
items.translated_title: 新款Apple Watch 5G功能在多个国家/地区发布时缺失
items.content:
The Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and Apple Watch SE 3 all feature an upgraded 5G modem and antenna architecture, but 5G connectivity won't be available in some countries.


5G is not listed as a supported feature for the new Apple Watch models in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Brazil, Mexico, Saudi Arabia, and several other countries in Europe, South America, Africa, and Asia.

The upgraded connectivity is available in the United States, UK, Germany, France, Switzerland, Spain, UAE, Thailand, Japan, China, Singapore, India, and more.

It is not clear why 5G connectivity isn't an option in some countries, but it could be due to a lack of regulatory approval or carriers that simply haven't added support. During yesterday's event, Apple showed a slide with carriers that are supporting 5G on the Apple Watch at launch. These were the carriers depicted:

  • Verizon (US)

  • AT&T (US)

  • T-Mobile (US)

  • Orange (Europe/Global)

  • EE (UK)

  • Three/3 (UK/International)

  • Sunrise (Switzerland)

  • AIS (Thailand)

  • SoftBank (Japan)

  • NTT Docomo (Japan)

  • au (Japan)

  • SmarTone (Hong Kong)

  • CSL (Hong Kong)

  • CTM (Macau)

  • Singtel (Singapore)

  • M1 (Singapore)

  • Zain (Middle East/Africa)

  • du (UAE)

  • Boost Mobile (US)

  • US Cellular (US)

  • Metro by T-Mobile (US)

  • China Unicom

  • China Mobile

  • China Telecom

  • Jio (India)


Canada's major carriers like Telus, Bell, and Rogers were not included, nor were Telstra, Vodafone, and Optus, which are the three main carriers in Australia.

You can go to the technical specifications page for the Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, or ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3 in your country to see if 5G will be available. In areas where 5G is not listed as a feature, the new Apple Watch models will rely on LTE.

Apple does not have separate Apple Watch models for different countries (except for China), so there is a good chance that the Apple Watches being sold in countries where 5G is currently unavailable do have the same 5G modem as Apple Watches in the U.S. and other locations where 5G is available. If that's the case, 5G connectivity could be enabled later when carriers begin offering support.

items.title: 苹果发布支持Qi2 25W认证的新款MagSafe充电器 (原标题: Apple Releases New MagSafe Charger With Qi2 25W Certification)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 苹果发布支持Qi2 25W认证的新款MagSafe充电器

苹果公司本周发布了其MagSafe充电器的新版本，该版本获得了Qi2 25W认证（也称为Qi 2.2）。这是苹果迄今为止发布的第三版MagSafe充电器。

**主要特点与改进：**
*   **Qi2 25W认证：** 新版MagSafe充电器唯一显著的变化是支持Qi2 25W充电标准。
*   **更广泛的兼容性：**
    *   新充电器现在可以以高达25W的速度为谷歌新款Pixel 10智能手机及其他兼容设备进行无线充电。
    *   此前版本的MagSafe充电器仅能为所有iPhone 16和iPhone 17型号（不包括iPhone 16e）提供25W的充电速度。

**可用性与定价：**
*   该充电器现已上市，提供一米或两米长的USB-C连接线选项。
*   在美国市场的定价范围为39美元至49美元。

**iOS 26与Qi2 25W生态系统：**
*   随着iOS 26的发布，所有iPhone 16和iPhone 17型号（不包括iPhone 16e）都将支持Qi2 25W。
*   更新到iOS 26后，这些iPhone设备将能够使用任何Qi2 25W充电器进行无线充电，包括Belkin和Aukey等品牌近期推出的产品。

![magsafe dark blue](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CehtAx438oAZwPLIz1UezsYmR4c=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/magsafe-dark-blue.jpeg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了第三版MagSafe充电器，现已获得Qi2 25W认证。这款新充电器能以高达25W的速度为谷歌Pixel 10及其他兼容设备无线充电，而此前版本仅支持特定iPhone 16/17型号。它提供1米或2米USB-C线缆，价格介于39至49美元。随着iOS 26的推出，更多iPhone型号也将支持Qi2 25W充电。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布支持Qi2 25W认证的新款MagSafe充电器
items.content:
Apple this week released a new version of its MagSafe Charger with Qi2 25W certification. It is available to order now with a one-meter or two-meter USB-C cable attached to it, with pricing ranging from $39 to $49 in the United States.


As far as we can tell, the only change with the new MagSafe Charger is support for Qi2 25W, also known as Qi 2.2. With this certification, the new MagSafe Charger can wirelessly charge Google's new Pixel 10 smartphones and other compatible devices at up to 25W speeds, whereas the previous version of the MagSafe Charger only offers 25W charging speeds for all iPhone 16 and iPhone 17 models, excluding the iPhone 16e.

This is the third version of Apple's MagSafe Charger to date.

With iOS 26, all iPhone 16 and iPhone 17 models support Qi2 25W, excluding the iPhone 16e. After being updated to iOS 26, those devices can be wirelessly charged with any Qi2 25W charger, including recent options from Belkin and Aukey.
Tag: MagSafe
